definitions.text: cause to burst with a violent release of energy

examples: The boss exploded when he heard of the resignation of the secretary

definitions.text: be unleashed; emerge with violence or noise
cause to burst as a result of air pressure; of stop consonants like /p/, /t/, and /k/
drive from the stage by noisy disapproval
show (a theory or claim) to be baseless, or refute and make obsolete
burst and release energy as through a violent chemical or physical reaction
increase rapidly and in an uncontrolled manner
examples: The population of India is exploding
